dct_title_s: Poconos and the Northeast, Pennsylvania outdoors discovery map : Pennsylvania memories last a lifetime / [cartography by] Cartographic Information Division, Carto, Bureau of Planning and Research. (Text)
dct_description_sm: Shows recreation areas, facilities, and tourist attractions on road-map base. "Published by the Pocono Mountains Vacation Bureau, Inc., in cooperation with the Pennsylvania Power & Light Company [and others]." Trademark within map border: Pennsylvania memories last a lifetime, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Tom Ridge, governor. Includes notes, index to points of interest, location map (inset), color illustrations, and advertisements. Text, indexed directories, and color illustrations on verso.
dct_creator_sm: Pennsylvania. Department of Transportation. Cartographic Information Division
dct_publisher_sm: [Stroudsburg, PA] : Pocono Mountains Vacation Bureau Inc., [2000].
